description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hit the slopes with your avatar.  Enjoy breathtaking 3D HDR scenery, awesome 3D physics, hundreds of millions of levels, and more!  Snowboard alone or with a friend split-screen style.  You have but one goal - make it to the bottom of the mountain.  Oh, and don't worry about calling for a pick-up.  You are equipped with an infinite rocket booster should you need a push.  Use with caution!!
